page.title: 19ELDERLY RESIDENT, UNSTONE.
page.content: Nelly Manning, age 74, Ivy Cottage, Crow Lane. There 72 years. Attended St.Mary's School. Domestic service, Millhouses, Sheffield. Married 1940, Crow Lane Chapel (now closed), to Leslie Francis Manning, lorry driver. Widowed 10 yrs. "Village altered tremendously. Old village gone, most to Unstone Green. Apperknowle and Hundall too, all gone. "I remember Unstone station. Everyone went to Chesterfield or Sheffield by train.Sixpence return. People walked four miles from Marsh Lane to catch Sheffield train to work, walk home evening.Traffic mostly horse and cart. "Several pits in area,lots of outcrop working. Don't remember cable-ways, but tip was landmark. There for years, now gone. Remember church being built. Don't know what to make of present times. Not much future for village."
